name: Nostalgica
description:
Welcome to Nostalgica!

Complete all 13 levels and get power-ups to help you along your journey, even the Star Power, the strongest power-up in the game!

Other Modes Endless Mode

Unlocks once you beat Level 13.

Time yourself and get the most time survived on this mode!

Share your best time record with your friends and see who can make it to the top!

Chaos Mode

You will be given 3 minutes to get the highest score.
